title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 156.4 - Camping
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 156.4 - Camping

State Regulations

Camping is prohibited in rest or parking areas or at scenic
overlooks. No tent or shelter shall be erected in any rest or parking area or
scenic overlook. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
156.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
